meanings.definition: Articles of merchandise or manufacture; goods
meanings.sent1: The store sells various wares like clothes and toys.
meanings.sent2: The market is full of different wares for sale.
meanings.sent3: The wares on the shelves seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was her best ware to attract customers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful wares in the shop caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A particular kind or class of goods
meanings.sent1: The antique dealer specializes in rare wares from the past.
meanings.sent2: The bakery's specialty wares are their delicious pastries.
meanings.sent3: The wares on display looked like they were from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: His collection of vintage wares was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The artisan's handmade wares were admired by all who visited.

meanings.definition: To be cautious or aware of something
meanings.sent1: She always wares of the dangers of crossing the street.
meanings.sent2: He wares of the slippery floor and walks carefully.
meanings.sent3: The cat wares of the dog approaching slowly.
meanings.sent4: The detective wares of any suspicious activity in the area.
meanings.sent5: They wares of the storm approaching and prepared accordingly.
